createQueries: CREATE TABLE public.log (    source character varying,    id character varying,    worker character varying,    snd1 timestamp without time zone,    rep1 timestamp without time zone,    snd2 timestamp without time zone,    rep2 timestamp without time zone,   result character varying)
CREATE TABLE public.reqdata (source character varying,    id character varying,    guid character varying,     inn character varying)
CREATE TABLE public.resdata (source character varying,    id character varying,    nomer character varying,    ifns character varying,  date character varying ,  link character varying)
CREATE TABLE public.workers (workerName character varying, updated timestamp without time zone)
CREATE TABLE public.errorlog (error character varying, datetime timestamp without time zone)
